: : SharpClaws : :
SharpClaws opens a comm channel to Flicker and Hydras. He didn't care who responded first.

SharpClaws: This is SharpClaws requesting to bring a possible new member into the base.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Blackstorm/Perceptor


Blackstorm looked that Maxima needed Perceptor's skills more, so she 
said "Just hold on, I'll call him..." Blackstorm opened her comlink 
and said "Perceptor, here's Blackstorm"

"What do you need, Blackstorm...? I'm busy" replied the male by com 
link

"Maxima needs you, sir... My skills are't enough to cure her wounds" 
said Blackstorm.

"I see"replied Perceptor "Care her until I arrive, I don't delay "

Blackstorm looked to Maxima and said "Hold on, Maxima, He'll be here 
soon"

Outside Perceptor looked to Sharpclaws and Battera and said "I have 
to go, Sharpclaws, why don't you try to contact Flicker, and ask 
autorization to came in with Battera... I can't wait more and I have 
other patient to attend"

Perceptor stood up and walked towards the Base
